oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Common field problems in camelids
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Walker, Pamela G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: camelids
parasites
Mycoplasma haemolamae
meningeal worm infection
anemia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On the whole, came lids are a hardy group and not prone to diseases. In this session we will discuss common causes of problems in came lids and how to treat and manage these conditions. Some of the topics to be discussed are gastrointestinal parasites, Mycaplasma haema/amae, meningeal worm infection, polioencephalomalacia, and more.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2018; 200-204
